mapper.sql: id, guest_ids, room_number, check_in_time, check_out_time, check_out_real_time, pay, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by
mapper.insert:
insert into check_in_record (id, guest_ids, room_number, check_in_time, check_out_time, check_out_real_time, pay, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.guestIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.roomNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.checkInTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.checkOutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.checkOutRealTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.pay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
